类的使用
org.springframework.boot.context.embedded.EmbeddedWebApplicationContext

  • 使用EmbeddedWebApplicationContext的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.boot.context.embedded
    Specialized ApplicationContext that supports embedded servlet containers.
    org.springframework.boot.system
    General system support classes.

    • org.springframework.boot.context.embedded中EmbeddedWebApplicationContext的使用

      org.springframework.boot.context.embedded中EmbeddedWebApplicationContext的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AnnotationConfigEmbeddedWebApplicationContext
      EmbeddedWebApplicationContext that accepts annotated classes as input - in particular @Configuration -annotated classes, but also plain @Component classes and JSR-330 compliant classes using javax.inject annotations.
      class  XmlEmbeddedWebApplicationContext
      EmbeddedWebApplicationContext which takes its configuration from XML documents, understood by an XmlBeanDefinitionReader.
      返回EmbeddedWebApplicationContext的org.springframework.boot.context.embedded中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      EmbeddedWebApplicationContext EmbeddedServletContainerInitializedEvent.getApplicationContext()
      Access the application context that the container was created in.
      参数类型为EmbeddedWebApplicationContext的org.springframework.boot.context.embedded中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected String ServerPortInfoApplicationContextInitializer.getPropertyName(EmbeddedWebApplicationContext context) 
      参数类型为EmbeddedWebApplicationContext的org.springframework.boot.context.embedded中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      EmbeddedServletContainerInitializedEvent(EmbeddedWebApplicationContext applicationContext, EmbeddedServletContainer source) 

    • org.springframework.boot.system中EmbeddedWebApplicationContext的使用

      参数类型为EmbeddedWebApplicationContext的org.springframework.boot.system中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected File EmbeddedServerPortFileWriter.getPortFile(EmbeddedWebApplicationContext applicationContext)
      Return the actual port file that should be written for the given application context.
